instructions:
Compatible with the Valor Heroic Roleplaying System, which can be found [here](https://valorousgames.com/).

* Tabbled layout inspired by the official character sheet.
* Automatic calculations for nearly all values.
* Built-in custom technique building, with detailed descriptions of the technique's effects generated in real time.
* Built-in roll buttons for attribute rolls, defense rolls, and using techniques.
* Auto-tracking for skill points on boost, weaken, and transformation techniques.
